gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Raptors 123, Hornets 117
gameRecap.excerpt: Toronto defeats Charlotte, 123-117. For Toronto, RJ Barrett led the way with 23 points (four 3PM), six rebounds, and five assists as Scottie Barnes added 18 points, four rebounds, and five assists. Miles Bridges led the way with a career high 45 points (six 3PM), eight rebounds, and seven assists while Brandon Miller tallied 20 points and four rebounds for Charlotte in the losing effort. Toronto wins and improves to 18-33 on the season, while Charlotte moves to 10-40 with the loss.
